algorithm_technique: Brute force iteration over all possible hourglass top-left corners.
problem_summary_simple: Find the hourglass shape in a matrix with the largest sum of its elements.
problem_summary_technical: Iterate through all possible top-left corners of a 3x3 hourglass shape in a given m x n matrix to find the maximum sum.
key_insights: The hourglass shape is fixed and has a specific 3x3 pattern with a center element.
The constraints on matrix dimensions (m, n >= 3) ensure at least one hourglass can always be formed.
A simple nested loop iterating through valid top-left corners is sufficient.
